function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Divergent Perceptions of Coronavirus Threat","Impact":"Divergent perceptions of the coronavirus threat can lead to varied responses and behaviors, impacting the spread of the disease.","Mitigation":"Education and information dissemination to address misconceptions and provide accurate understanding of the threat.","Technologies":"Information and communication technologies for widespread dissemination of accurate information.","People":"Consumers in Cluster 1 (Survivalists) and Cluster 3 (Rejectionists)","Owner":"Health authorities, educational institutions, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Irrational Responses and Behaviors","Impact":"Irrational responses, such as fear, disbelief, and panic buying, can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Behavioral interventions, psychological support, and targeted messaging to address irrational responses.","Technologies":"Behavioral psychology techniques, community engagement platforms, and targeted advertising and communication tools.","People":"Consumers in Cluster 1 (Survivalists) and Cluster 3 (Rejectionists)","Owner":"Public health organizations, behavioral psychologists, and marketing/advertising agencies."},{"Description":"Demographic Influence on Irrational Responses","Impact":"Demographic differences, such as gender and age, may influence irrational responses to disease threats.","Mitigation":"Targeted messaging and interventions tailored to specific demographic groups to address irrational responses.","Technologies":"Data analytics for demographic targeting, personalized marketing platforms, and behavioral intervention technology.","People":"Consumers in Cluster 1 (Survivalists) and Cluster 3 (Rejectionists)","Owner":"Public health organizations, marketing/advertising agencies, and research institutions."}]}
